Content:: Udawatte Nanda Thero (or Udawatte Nanda) is a Sri Lankan politician and a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[1][2] In the 2010 general election he contested from the Sri Lanka National Front in Kandy District but was not elected. During the campaign he criticized his former party, the JHU and said that it was hijacked by laymen.  This article about a politician from Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
